divs: sighting detailswhile sitting in the back yard around a camp fire, i observed a large white ball falling frome the sky. it had the same hue as the street light but it was surrounded a green flame. the flame was completely around the ball. it left a trail maybe 3 times as long as the ball itself. i was facing due south when i saw the ball. it fell in a dirrect path to the ground. im sure i can go to where i think it landed. it looked identical to the video that they are showing... saying it is a meteor. on thing for sure this one hit the ground because it was coming straight down. at least 8 witnesses. 3 adults and 5 kids saw this thing. it scared the heck out of every one... we have been having frequent encounters. mostly the starlike ufo. and the are dropping out of the sky and chasing\following\observing us very closely. someone need to do something about these situations. please send us some help
Summary: Large ball, white in center with turquoise flames around it.
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Junction City
There was one other sighting in Junction City on or around December 6th 2008
